doc:
Eric Idle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Idle 0 Eric Idle (born 29 March 1943) is an English comedian, actor, voice actor, author, singer-songwriter, musician, writer and comedic composer. Idle was a member of the British surreal comedy group Monty Python, a member of the parody rock band The Rutles, and the author of the Broadway musical Spamalot. Eric_Idle ( born_29_March_1943 ) is an_English_comedian , actor , voice_actor , author_,_singer-songwriter_,_musician_,_writer_and_comedic_composer . Idle was a_member of the_British_surreal_comedy_group_Monty_Python , a_member of the_parody_rock_band The_Rutles , and the_author of the_Broadway_musical_Spamalot .
